: : Kup : :

Kup opens a return comm channel to Windlord.

Kup(via commlink): I have. As soon as Azure gets out of my vehical 
mode and goes to help Nightlight, I'll come help you with those pods. 
Kup out.

Kup shuts down the channel, waiting for Azure to get out of his truck 
bed so he could transform.

> Windlord::
>
